Data:
From: [SENDER]
To: [RECEIVER]
Subject: MAS Provisioning Notification (contains an attachment)
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-type: Multipart/Mixed; boundary="NextPart"

--NextPart
Content-Type: text/plain

[IMPORT-CERT-MSG]

MAS provisioning status: [STATUS]
Region: [REGION]
Unique String: [UNIQ-STR]
OpenShift Cluster URL: [OPENSHIFT-CLUSTER-CONSOLE-URL]
OpenShift API URL: [OPENSHIFT-CLUSTER-API-URL]
OpenShift User: [OCP-USER]
OpenShift Password: [OCP-PASSWORD]
SLS Endpoint URL: [SLS-ENDPOINT-URL]
BAS Endpoint URL: [BAS-ENDPOINT-URL]
MAS Initial Setup URL: [MAS-URL-INIT-SETUP]
MAS Admin URL: [MAS-URL-ADMIN]
MAS Workspace URL: [MAS-URL-WORKSPACE]
MAS User: [MAS-USER]
MAS Password: [MAS-PASSWORD]


--NextPart
Content-Type: text/plain;
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="masocp-[UNIQ-STR]-ca.crt"
[CA-CERT]
